评论详情: I like these a lot, even though they could fit more snugly around my legs. (I am a small person so most would probably not have this issue.) They are warm and made of a good material, but just as a heads up they do come in a vacuum-sealed plastic bag, so they will need a moment in the wash/dryer to straighten out the wrinkles.

类型: Size: One SizeColor: B White Flared
评论详情: I really wish they were an inch or two longer to create more puff on the bottom when worn, but they're warm enough and they feel good. I think they'd fit better length-wise if I was shorter.  They is HARDLY ANY ELASTICITY at the top. They do not have a band to keep them up and are held up by the thickness of your calves alone. If you have thinner calves, they'll fall down a lot probably. I really wish they did, but they're 10 dollars so its understandable I guess.  So far I've worn them for about 3 hours around the house and they haven't fallen down once, but they do get lower. In the video, I jump up and down and try to shake them off, but they never fall down fully :)!!  In the pictures I tucked the bottom (not very) because I don't particularly like the roll at the end. In the video I did not tuck them in.  Summary: + Warm enough, knit. Look cute and make me happy. Stayed up for 3 hours, won't fall even when I'm jumping around. - Not puffy enough at the bottom like in the pictures, so I wish they were longer. Barely stay up because no elastic.

类型: Size: One SizeColor: B Black Flared
评论详情: I wore these leg warmers for a few hours after I bought them and they started to really itch at the top (where the elastic was digging into my skin). They were not very stretchy, especially at the complete top, but they were pretty comfortable. I have thicker calves, but not absolutely huge, so if you also have thicker calves, I would recommend getting a pair that are plus-size, or are generally stretchier. Also, the bottom of the leg warmers kept rolling up for some reason? Which was also pretty annoying. But, they were worth it for the price.
